content: Provider memo: PAC41732's claim for xerubimab infusion denied due to incomplete documentation of prior treatment failures. Submitted records showed only one failed antibiotic course (ampicillin-sulbactam). Require additional documentation of ciprofloxacin reaction from Lakeside Urgent Care per HX-882TN coverage criteria. Denial reviewed by claims supervisor Tara Nesbit (ID: CS-8832).
